content.description: The format dialog has been extensively revised. You can now choose from the following three format types in the left part of the dialog: Number, Date and time, Time span. In the right pane you can edit the chosen format and make extensive settings for the respective format type.
You will now find two new Building Blocks in the script editor. With these, you can use an existing connection from, for example, a JSON data source to send various HTTP requests.
